# MEDAS Solutions - Complete Healthcare Software Documentation

## Company Profile

MEDAS Solutions is an enterprise healthcare software provider established in 2004, headquartered in Dubai, UAE. We specialize in developing and implementing healthcare IT solutions for hospitals, clinics, laboratories, and pharmacies across the GCC region and worldwide.

### Key Statistics
- 500+ healthcare facilities served
- 4 continents covered
- 20+ countries of operation
- 24/7 technical support
- 99.9% uptime guarantee
- 20+ years of experience
- 200+ employees

### Mission
To empower healthcare providers with innovative technology solutions that improve patient outcomes, enhance operational efficiency, and ensure regulatory compliance.

---

## Complete Product Suite

### 1. E-Clinic (Outpatient Management System)

**Overview:** Complete outpatient management solution designed for polyclinics, medical centers, and specialty clinics.

**Key Features:**
- Multi-specialty appointment scheduling
- Smart queue management with digital displays
- Comprehensive clinical documentation
- ICD-10 and CPT coding
- E-prescribing with drug interaction alerts
- Lab and radiology order management
- Integrated billing and invoicing
- Insurance pre-authorization and claims
- Patient portal for online booking
- Mobile application for patients
- Telemedicine integration
- Business intelligence dashboards

**Compliance:** NABIDH, Malaffi, NPHIES, HIPAA, GDPR

**Ideal For:** Polyclinics, medical centers, specialty clinics, dental clinics, dermatology centers

---

### 2. HIMS (Hospital Information Management System)

**Overview:** Web-based enterprise resource planning (ERP) system for hospitals with 32+ integrated modules.

**Core Modules:**

**Clinical Modules:**
- Patient Registration (MPI)
- Appointment Scheduling
- Outpatient Management (OPD)
- Inpatient Management (IPD/ADT)
- Emergency Department (ED)
- Operation Theatre (OT)
- Intensive Care Unit (ICU)
- Ward/Bed Management
- Doctors' Workbench
- Nurses' Workbench
- Clinical Documentation
- Order Management
- E-Prescribing
- Discharge Summary

**Diagnostic Modules:**
- Laboratory Information System (LIS)
- Radiology Information System (RIS)
- PACS Integration
- Blood Bank Management
- Pathology Module

**Support Services:**
- Pharmacy Management
- Inventory Management
- Central Sterile Supply (CSSD)
- Dietary Management
- Housekeeping
- Maintenance Management

**Administrative Modules:**
- Billing and Revenue Cycle
- Insurance Management
- Medical Records
- Quality Management
- HRMS and Payroll
- Asset Management
- Procurement

**Patient Engagement:**
- Patient Portal
- Mobile Applications
- Telemedicine Integration
- Appointment Reminders
- Health Records Access

**Compliance:** NABIDH, Malaffi, NPHIES, Riayati, JCI, CBAHI, HIPAA, GDPR

**Integrations:** HL7, FHIR, DICOM, IHE profiles, insurance portals, government health exchanges

---

### 3. E-Lab (Laboratory Information System)

**Overview:** Comprehensive laboratory workflow automation for clinical, pathology, and reference laboratories.

**Key Features:**
- Sample collection and accessioning
- Barcode-based sample tracking
- Work list management
- 3000+ analyzer interfaces (HL7/ASTM)
- Bi-directional instrument connectivity
- Auto-validation with configurable rules
- Delta check and critical value alerts
- Quality control (Westgard rules)
- External quality assurance (EQA)
- Turnaround time (TAT) monitoring
- Reference lab integration
- Results reporting and distribution
- Cumulative patient reports
- Microbiology workflow
- Histopathology module
- Molecular diagnostics support

**Compliance:** CAP, NABL, JCI, ISO 15189, CLIA

---

### 4. Telemedicine Platform

**Overview:** Virtual care solution enabling remote consultations between patients and healthcare providers.

**Key Features:**
- HD video consultations (WebRTC)
- Audio-only consultation option
- Screen sharing and whiteboard
- Secure file sharing
- Virtual waiting room
- Multi-participant calls
- E-prescribing integration
- Lab/radiology order placement
- Online payment processing
- Appointment scheduling
- Automated reminders (SMS/Email)
- Consultation recording (optional)
- EMR integration
- Mobile applications (iOS/Android)

**Security:** End-to-end encryption, HIPAA compliant

---

### 5. E-Pharma (Pharmacy Management System)

**Overview:** Comprehensive pharmacy operations management for hospital pharmacies, retail pharmacies, and pharmacy chains.

**Key Features:**
- Inventory management (FIFO/LIFO/FEFO)
- Purchase and procurement
- Supplier management
- Stock transfers and adjustments
- Expiry tracking and alerts
- Point of sale (POS) billing
- E-prescription processing
- Drug interaction checking
- Allergy alerts
- Controlled substance management
- Narcotic register
- Insurance processing
- Multi-branch support
- Batch tracking
- Returns management

**Compliance:** MOH regulations, NABIDH, controlled substance laws

---

### 6. E-Veterinary

**Overview:** Specialized practice management software for veterinary clinics, animal hospitals, and pet care centers.

**Key Features:**
- Pet/animal registration
- Owner management
- Electronic medical records
- SOAP notes
- Vaccination schedules and reminders
- Appointment scheduling
- Treatment protocols
- Pharmacy and inventory
- Laboratory integration
- Billing and invoicing
- Insurance processing
- Boarding management
- Grooming services
- Referral management

---

### 7. Mobile Application (Patient Engagement)

**Overview:** Patient-facing mobile application for iOS and Android devices.

**Key Features:**
- Appointment booking and management
- Doctor search and profiles
- Medical history access
- Lab results viewing
- Radiology reports and images
- Prescription history
- Medication reminders
- Video consultations
- Online bill payments
- Health tips and articles
- Push notifications
- Family member profiles
- Insurance card storage
- Vaccination records

---

### 8. AccreHealth (Quality & Accreditation Management)

**Overview:** Comprehensive software for healthcare quality management and accreditation preparation.

**Key Features:**
- Document control system
- Policy and procedure management
- JCI/CBAHI/NABH standards mapping
- Self-assessment tools
- Gap analysis
- Audit scheduling and tracking
- Non-conformance management
- Corrective and preventive actions (CAPA)
- Incident reporting
- Risk management
- Training records
- Committee meeting management
- Key performance indicators (KPIs)
- Dashboard and analytics
- Accreditation timeline tracking

**Standards Supported:** JCI, CBAHI, NABH, NABL, ISO, OSHA

---

## Technical Specifications

### Architecture
- Cloud-native microservices architecture
- On-premise deployment option
- Hybrid cloud support
- Multi-tenant SaaS model
- High availability clustering
- Disaster recovery support

### Technology Stack
- Frontend: Modern web technologies (responsive design)
- Backend: Enterprise-grade application servers
- Database: Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL
- Mobile: Native iOS and Android applications

### Integration Standards
- HL7 v2.x messaging
- HL7 FHIR R4
- DICOM for imaging
- IHE profiles (PIX, PDQ, XDS)
- RESTful APIs
- SOAP web services

### Security
- SSL/TLS encryption
- AES-256 data encryption at rest
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Multi-factor authentication (MFA)
- Audit logging
- Session management
- IP whitelisting

### Compliance Certifications
- HIPAA compliant
- GDPR compliant
- ISO 27001 certified data centers
- SOC 2 Type II

---

## Regional Compliance

### UAE
- **NABIDH** (Dubai): Full integration with Dubai Health Authority's health information exchange
- **Malaffi** (Abu Dhabi): Complete connectivity with SEHA and DOH systems
- **MOHAP**: Ministry of Health and Prevention compliance

### Saudi Arabia
- **NPHIES**: National Platform for Health and Insurance Exchange Services integration
- **Riayati**: Saudi Electronic Health Records system connectivity
- **CBAHI**: Central Board for Accreditation of Healthcare Institutions standards
- **ZATCA**: E-invoicing compliance

### Qatar
- **MOPH**: Ministry of Public Health regulations
- **Cerner/Epic integration** for major hospital networks

### Other GCC
- Kuwait MOH compliance
- Bahrain NHRA requirements
- Oman MOH standards

---

### English Keywords

### Arabic Keywords
